segments.text: Please put your baggage on the counter and open it , let me have a look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything subject to duty in your suitcase ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . Nothing except my personal belongings , such as clothes , notebooks and some gifts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have cigarettes for my own use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you'll have to pay some duty on these cigarettes because they exceed the quota . And this article is liable for duty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much duty should I pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment . I'll make out your duty memo . ( Writing and giving the memo to Mr . Green ) Take it and pay the girl over there .
segments.speaker: S1
